about_the_game:
Wallflower

It's moving day! Settle into your new home with your parents and little brother. Unpack and get to know your new house. Ignore what you hear- that's just the house settling. It may be a bit lonely, but you've got your trusty collection of movies and videotapes to keep you company! To be honest, you're used to being alone. After all, there's no one else here.

Wallflower is a retro, cozy horror game with a strong narrative focus and point and click elements. Made with a deep affection for handheld games and overflowing with pixelated charm, it is a love letter to retro adventure games and 90's horror media.

Features:

  • An entire house to explore! It is very safe.

  • A VHS collection of questionable size

  • Point and click style puzzles

  • Items of suspicious origin and intent

  • Things that go bump in the night

  • Multiple endings

  • A scampish little brother

  • Groundbreaking FULL COLOR graphics!

  • The most charming protagonist possible (you)
